instruction.en: Activate inclusion on the device by pressing any one of the four buttons for one second
instruction.nl: Om pairing te activeren, druk langer een seconde op een van de knoppen van de afstandsbediening.

hint.en: The parameter determines the behaviour of buttons 1 and 3.

label.en: (0) Seperately, button 1 works with control group A, button 3 with control group C. Click is On, Hold is dimming Up, Double click is Off, Click-Hold is dimming Down.
(1) Pair without double clicks, button A/C are Up/Down. Click is On/Off, Hold is dimming Up/Down. Single clicks works with group B and D
(2) Pair with double clicks. button A/C are Up/Down. Click is On/Off, Hold is dimming Up/Down. Single clicks works with group B,double click with group D

hint.en: The parameter determines the behaviour of buttons 2 and 4.

label.en: (0) Seperately, button 2 works with control group B, button 4 with control group D. Click is On, Hold is dimming Up, Double click is Off, Click-Hold is dimming Down.
(1) Pair without double clicks, button B/D are Up/Down correspondingly. Click is On/Off, Hold is dimming Up/Down. Single clicks works with group B and D
(2) Pair with double clicks. button B/D are Up/Down correspondingly. Click is On/Off, Hold is dimming Up/Down. Single clicks works with group B,double click with group D

hint.en: Defines the command to be sent to devices of control group A when the related button is pressed.

label.en: (1) Switch On/Off and Dim (send Basic Set and Switch Multilevel)

hint.en: Defines the command to be sent to devices of control group B when the related button is pressed.

label.en: (1) Switch On/Off and Dim (send Basic Set and Switch Multilevel)

hint.en: Defines the command to be sent to devices of control group C when the related button is pressed.

label.en: (1) Switch On/Off and Dim (send Basic Set and Switch Multilevel)

hint.en: Defines the command to be sent to devices of control group D when the related button is pressed.

label.en: (1) Switch On/Off and Dim (send Basic Set and Switch Multilevel)

hint.en: Send the following Switch All commands.
Invert the behaviour of the buttons.

label.en: Blocks wakeup even when wakeup interval is set.

hint.en: If device wakes up and no controller nearby, several unsuccessful attempts will drain battery.

label.en: (1) Wakeup is possible if configured accordingly. (Default)
Send unsolicited Battery Report on Wake Up
(1) To same node as wake up notification. (Default)
